content: {A想象中}Sani never bothers picking a place to live, she just sleeps wherever her car is parked. As for Captain Mo... Ah, well, you can never tell if he's sleeping or not.
info: 新屋选址-格连_主流程文本

content: Mm-hmm, having a life outside of work is important! <style=SizeSmall>Though, for now, the Camp needs someone on duty around the clock...</style>

content: {A心虚目移}I never would've thought the delivery guy would manage to get lost! There must be another solution. <style=SizeSmall>Perhaps, some of the damaged goods...</style>

content: Glenn's tip of the day: Never go to work on an empty stomach{短暂停} {A点头}and always leave on time!

新屋选址-格连_主流程文本

content: And when I want to sleep,{短暂停} I just take apart a cardboard box... Ah, I-I don't mean I'd steal space from the supplies!
info: 新屋选址-格连_主流程文本

content: Due to a variety of reasons, only a quarter of the ordered goods have arrived. I should have considered all possible contingencies and gone for a more comprehensive order instead.
info: 新屋选址-格连_主流程文本

content: In the past... I was reluctant to do that because I was worried about creating unnecessary waste. After all, if we bought something up, someone in need might be left short-handed.
info: 新屋选址-格连_主流程文本

content: {A思考}It's a... noun? It's when you order more supplies than necessary to ensure there's enough to cover any potential shortages.
info: 新屋选址-格连_主流程文本
